meanings.definition: A straight line or curve that generates a surface or solid figure.
meanings.sent1: The generatrices of the cone create its unique shape.
meanings.sent2: Architects use generatrices to design complex structures.
meanings.sent3: The generatrices decided to take a break and relax on the sofa.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a set of generatrices, shaping the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The generatrices danced across the paper, bringing the drawing to life.
